page.title: 10MANAGER OF GRANDWAYS, BRIGG
page.content: My father manages Grandways Supermarket at Brigg. Grandways, Brigg is a branch of a large regional supermarket chain with sixty-eight branches in Yorkshire, Lincolnshire, Derbyshire. Grandways is the largest retail business in Brigg. They get ll,OOO customers per week although the population of Brigg is less then 6,OOO. The store opened in l98l replacing a smaller shop in Wrawby Street. It is built on the site of Spring's factory on the bank of the Ancholme. The store covers l2,OOO square feet and has parking for over one hundred cars. The shop sells food and household goods, fresh meat, fruit, vegetables, wine, spirits and tobacco. The staff work thirty-nine hours per week and my father fifty hours per week. There are sixty people working in the store.
